name: Pittsford Ventures Management
overview: Pittsford Ventures V is a “first out of the gate” special situation, private equity fund, leveraging comparative advantages of each country to build super-competitive businesses for the global market through a uniquely focused proprietary deal flow in health care, informatics, telecom, clean tech. We are now fully invested from prior funds, but will be making new commitments when our newest fund, Pittsford Ventures V, is fully capitalized.

funds.name: Fund V
funds.source_description: Pittsford Ventures Back In The Game With New Emerging-Markets Fund
